display_long_description:
Nugget Projects is a fast-paced, physics-driven VR experience built on the foundation of gorilla locomotion. Swing, climb, and launch yourself through a wild variety of chaotic environments using only your arms — no buttons, no joysticks, just pure physical movement.

Set in a quirky, experimental world where you're the test subject of unpredictable and often hilarious challenges, Nugget Projects combines skill-based traversal, obstacle courses, and multiplayer madness. Whether you're scaling walls, dodging traps, racing friends, or solving puzzles with creative movement, every session delivers a unique and energetic VR adventure.

With regular content updates, community-driven features, and an ever-expanding roster of challenges, Nugget Projects keeps you coming back for more — all powered by intuitive locomotion that makes you feel like you're really there.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Nugget?
